name: 剑舞
description:
Built in with numerous unique gameplay features, including dungeons, fashion, exclusive bosses, romantic relationships, cross server battles, and PK competitions, there are plenty of exciting ones to come. Subduing demons and eliminating demons, enhancing the realm of cultivation, soaring through tribulations, and stepping into the realm of immortality, this world of cultivation is never monotonous.

With numerous unique gameplay features such as cross server immortal alliance battles, you can enjoy extraordinary passionate battles in the world of cultivating immortals!

More domineering and powerful, cool fashion, and a variety of personalized mounts to fight shoulder to shoulder with you!

Chat and make friends, find your significant other on the path of immortality and chivalry, couple dungeon, and work together!

The path of cultivating immortality with passion and passion is right under your feet. Moving forward can create a legend of cultivating immortality!
